page.title: 10BELLINGHAM LEGENDS.
page.content: {The Long Pack. The family from Lee Hall near Bellingham went to London long ago,leaving the house in the care of the servants.When a pedlar came to the door,the maid refused to let him in but let him leave his pack overnight. Later she saw the pack move and summoned the stable boy.He shot the pack and it groaned and bled.They kept watch and later scared away a gang of robbers.No-one knew the body in the pack.It was buried and the grave was marked with scissors and bobbins to show it came from the "Long Pack". {Cuddies Well. A young girl got her hand stuck to the material when she tried to sew her dress on a Sunday.Only the water from St.Cuthbert's Well was able to cure her.
